description.en: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.ar: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.br: Acrescenta +300 de vida (HP) e +200 de Ataque (ATQ) por uma hora. Uma vez desgastado, se torna um Pergaminho do Poder Sobrecarregado.
description.cns: HP+300，攻击力+200，持续一小时。 一旦它消失，它就会变成超级力量卷轴。
description.de: Max HP +300, Angriff +200, hält 1 Stunde. Sobald es abgelaufen ist, verwandelt es sich in eine Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.fi: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.fil: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.fr: PV Max +300, Attaque +200. Se transforme ensuite en Secret de puissance ultime.
description.id: Meningkatkan Health Points (HP) Anda sebesar +300 dan Attack Power (ATK) Anda sebesar +200 selama satu jam. Setelah habis, itu menjadi Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.it: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+300、攻撃力が+200増加します。効果が切れると、豪傑スクロール(S)が手に入ります。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 체력이 +300, 공격력이 +200 증가합니다. 다 사용하면 충전된 파워 스크롤이 됩니다.
description.nl: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.pl: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.ru: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.sp: Aumenta tus Puntos de Salud (HP) en +300 y tu Poder de Ataque (ATK) en +200 durante una hora. Cuando expira, se convierte en un Pergamino de Poder Supercargado.
description.sw: Increases your Health Points (HP) by +300 and your Attack Power (ATK) by +200 for one hour. Once it wears off, it becomes a Super Charged Power Scroll.
description.th: เพิ่มคะแนนสุขภาพ (HP) ของคุณ +300 และพลังโจมตี (ATK) ของคุณ +200 เป็นเวลาหนึ่งชั่วโมง เมื่อมันหมดอายุการใช้งาน มันจะกลายเป็น Super Charged Power Scroll
description.tw: HP+300和攻擊力+200，持續1小時，時間一到將會變成究極力量卷軸
description.vi: Tăng Điểm máu (HP) của bạn lên +300 và Sức mạnh Công kích (ATK) của bạn lên +200 trong một giờ. Một khi nó bị mòn, nó sẽ trở thành một cuộn siêu sạc.
